plot outline: A notorious village sorcerer uses black magic and dark forces to kill children with the evil purpose of achieving godly powers. Guru finds out and gets the sorcerer arrested. Years later, after the sorcerer is released from police custody, Guru must fight him again.
title: Nigarva
plot: A notorious village sorcerer uses black magic and dark forces to kill children with the evil purpose of achieving godly powers. Guru finds out and gets the sorcerer arrested. Years later, after the sorcerer is released from police custody, Guru must fight him again.
